scripts.build: echo "The build step is not required when using JavaScript!" && exit 0
scripts.synth:dev: NODE_ENV=dev NODE_CONFIG_DIR=./cdk/config ENV=dev npx cdk synth --stage dev
scripts.deploy:dev: NODE_ENV=dev NODE_CONFIG_DIR=./cdk/config ENV=dev npx cdk deploy --require-approval never --stage dev
scripts.synth:prod: NODE_ENV=prod NODE_CONFIG_DIR=./cdk/config ENV=prod npx cdk synth --stage prod
scripts.deploy:prod: NODE_ENV=prod NODE_CONFIG_DIR=./cdk/config ENV=prod npx cdk deploy --require-approval never --stage prod
